# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸ± Kitty Terminal Configuration - Catppuccin Mocha Theme
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# Fontes
font_family FiraCode Nerd Font
bold_font FiraCode Nerd Font Bold
italic_font FiraCode Nerd Font Italic
bold_italic_font FiraCode Nerd Font Bold Italic
font_size 12.0

# Ligaduras e Cursor
disable_ligatures never
cursor_shape block
cursor_blink_interval 0.5
cursor_beam_thickness 1.5
cursor_underline_thickness 1.5

# Cursor Trail Effect
cursor_trail_step 0.5
cursor_trail_decay 0.1 0.4

# Scrollback
scrollback_lines 10000
scrollback_pager less --chop-long-lines --RAW-CONTROL-CHARS +INPUT_LINE_NUMBER

# Layouts
enabled_layouts tall:bias=70;fat:bias=70;grid;stack;split

# Tab Bar
tab_bar_edge bottom
tab_bar_style powerline
tab_powerline_style slanted
tab_title_template "{index}:{fmt.bold}{title}"
active_tab_font_style bold
inactive_tab_font_style normal

# Background & Opacity
background_opacity 0.90
dynamic_background_opacity yes

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

background #1e1e2e

cursor #f5e0dc

# ANSI Colors

# Tab bar separation

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸ“¦ Tmux Configuration - Catppuccin Mocha Theme
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸ”§ Basic Settings
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

set -g default-terminal "tmux-256color"
set -ag terminal-overrides ",xterm-256color:RGB"
set -g history-limit 100000

# Prefix: Ctrl+Space (mais acessÃ­vel que Ctrl+b)
unbind C-b
set -g prefix C-Space
bind C-Space send-prefix

# Enable mouse
set -g mouse on

# Start windows and panes at 1
set -g base-index 1
setw -g pane-base-index 1
set -g renumber-windows on

# Window & Pane Names
set -g automatic-rename on
set -g automatic-rename-format "#{b:pane_current_path}"
set -g set-titles on
set -g set-titles-string "#T"

# Activity & Bell
set -g monitor-activity on
set -g visual-activity on
set -g visual-bell off
set -g bell-action none

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# âŒ¨ï¸ Keybindings
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

# Reload config
bind r source-file ~/.config/tmux/tmux.conf \; display "Config reloaded!"

# Panes
bind - split-window -v -c "#{pane_current_path}"
bind | split-window -h -c "#{pane_current_path}"
bind _ split-window -fh -c "#{pane_current_path}"

# Navigate panes (vim-like)
bind h select-pane -L
bind j select-pane -D
bind k select-pane -U
bind l select-pane -R

# Resize panes
bind -r H resize-pane -L 5
bind -r J resize-pane -D 5
bind -r K resize-pane -U 5
bind -r L resize-pane -R 5

# Rotate panes
bind o rotate-pane

# Windows
bind c new-window -c "#{pane_current_path}"
bind C-c new-window -c "#{pane_current_path}"
bind p previous-window
bind n next-window
bind , command-prompt -I "#W" "rename-window '%%'"
bind w choose-window

# Sessions
bind s choose-session
bind S new-session
bind detach -a

# Copy Mode (vim-like)
setw -g mode-keys vi
bind v copy-mode
bind P paste-buffer
bind -T copy-mode-vi v send-keys -X begin-selection
bind -T copy-mode-vi y send-keys -X copy-pipe-and-cancel "xclip -in -selection clipboard"
bind -T copy-mode-vi MouseDragEnd1Pane send-keys -X copy-pipe-and-cancel "xclip -in -selection clipboard"

# Clear screen
bind C-l send-keys 'C-l'

# Toggle pane zoom
bind z resize-pane -Z

# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
# ğŸ¨ Catppuccin Theme Configuration
# â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

set -g @catppuccin_flavour 'mocha'
set -g @catppuccin_status_background "none"
set -g @catppuccin_window_status_style "rounded"
set -g @catppuccin_window_number_position "left"
set -g @catppuccin_window_middle_separator " "
set -g @catppuccin_window_default_number " #I"
set -g @catppuccin_window_current_number " #I"
set -g @catppuccin_window_default_format "#{?window_start_flag, ,}#{E:#{?pane_synchronized,ğŸ”’,}} #W "
set -g @catppuccin_window_current_format "#{?window_start_flag, ,}#{E:#{?pane_synchronized,ğŸ”’,}} #W "
set -g @catppuccin_status_left_separator "  "
set -g @catppuccin_status_right_separator " "
set -g @catppuccin_status_connect_separator "no"

# Status Line
set -g status on
set -g status-interval 2
set -g status-justify left
set -g status-left-length 100
set -g status-right-length 100
set -g status-left "#[fg=mauve]â® #S "

content.thinking:
Now I can see the issues:

1. **Kitty error (line 192)**: `notify_on_cmd_finish 5` - The `notify_on_cmd_finish` option doesn't accept a numeric value like `5`. According to kitty documentation, valid values are: `never`, `command`, `python`, `all`, `debug`, or a boolean (`yes`, `no`, `true`, `false`).

2. **Tmux error (line 173)**: The syntax error is likely because of the emoji character `}` in the keybinding. Let me look at line 173 - it says `bind } swap-pane -D`. The issue is that `}` is a special character in tmux and needs to be quoted properly. Actually, looking more carefully, the issue might be that the user has an emoji or special character that's causing parsing issues.

Looking at line 173: `bind } swap-pane -D`

In tmux, the `}` character needs to be quoted. It should be: `bind '}' swap-pane -D`

Let me fix both issues.

content.text:
I found both issues:

**Kitty error (line 192):** `notify_on_cmd_finish 5` - This option doesn't accept numeric values. Valid values are: `never`, `command`, `python`, `all`, `debug`.

**Tmux error (line 173):** The `}` character in the keybinding needs to be quoted.

Let me fix both:

Fixed both errors:

**Kitty (kitty.conf:192)**
- Changed `notify_on_cmd_finish 5` â†’ `notify_on_cmd_finish command`
- The option only accepts: `never`, `command`, `python`, `all`, or `debug`

**Tmux (tmux.conf:173-174)**
- Added quotes around `}` and `{` characters
- Changed: `bind } swap-pane -D` â†’ `bind '}' swap-pane -D`
- Special characters in tmux keybindings need to be quoted

Both configurations should now load without errors.
